data.name: MS: Space Express
data.detailed_description:
Space Express is a casual courier simulation game. Rent or buy a spaceship of your own and go on a fun space delivery!

Game Content

Over 15 purchasable spaceships
Spaceship modification possible
Multiple space stations for travel

Game Story

In 2027, after receiving the "remains" that suddenly landed on the earth, human beings have successfully colonized many habitable planets, and the rapidly expanding population problem has been greatly alleviated. The mother planet that once had 7.8 billion people now only lives 5 billion Aboriginal people. In order to help the newly reclaimed colonial stars flourish, as a independent youth in the new era, you are graduating and you decide to become a space delivery man and build a bridge for each planets.

How to play

In addition to completing the company's order, you can enrich your own pockets by reselling private goods at different space logistics stations.

data.short_description: MS: Space Expressis a miniscape-style casual game. Players play the role of space couriers, earn money by reselling private goods after completing business orders, and experience the joy of space delivery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3200G+ or Intel Core 9100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or Intel Core 9400f
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX580 8G / GTX 1660ti or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers

Minimum:
